python.content: In Python 3.12+, f-strings can contain nested quotes and backslashes. Use for clearer formatting and fewer workarounds.

python.title: What's New in Python 3.12
python.content: Type parameter syntax: def f[T](x: T) -> T. Improved error messages. Performance improvements.

python_3_12.title: New type parameter syntax
python_3_12.content: def max[T](a: T, b: T) -> T: ... and class C[T]: ... are valid in 3.12.

architecture_refactor.title: Split god module
architecture_refactor.content: Extract cohesive subsets into new modules; reduce fan-out of the original; update imports.

deprecated_api.title: Deprecated API
deprecated_api.content: Check release notes for removed or deprecated APIs; prefer replacement APIs before upgrading. Pin known-good versions if needed.

typing.title: Type hints
typing.content: PEP 484; use typing and typing_extensions. For static checking: mypy, pyright. Python 3.12: def f[T](x: T) -> T.

cyclic_imports.title: Break import cycles
cyclic_imports.content: Move shared types to a separate module; use TYPE_CHECKING for type-only imports; or defer imports inside functions.

version_migration.title: Python version upgrade
version_migration.content: Check What's New and Deprecation sections. Test with target version; update syntax (e.g. 3.12 type params), replace removed stdlib (e.g. imp), fix deprecated APIs.

version_migration.title: Dependency upgrade
version_migration.content: Pin or constrain versions; run tests; check CHANGELOG for breaking changes. Use tools: pip-audit, safety.

security.title: Vulnerable dependencies
security.content: Run pip-audit or safety check. Update vulnerable packages; prefer maintained alternatives. Avoid eval, exec on untrusted input.

security.title: Deprecated and removed
security.content: Deprecated APIs may be removed in next major. Prefer replacements early; avoid postponing migration.

async_patterns.title: Async/await
async_patterns.content: asyncio; async def, await. Avoid blocking in async code. Use asyncio.run() for top-level. Context managers: async with.
